code: import client from'./client';var getAllTools=function getAllTools(){return client.get('/tools');};var getSpecificTool=function getSpecificTool(id){return client.get("/tools/".concat(id));};var createNewTool=function createNewTool(body){return client.post("/tools",body);};var updateTool=function updateTool(id,body){return client.put("/tools/".concat(id),body);};var deleteTool=function deleteTool(id){return client.delete("/tools/".concat(id));};export default{getAllTools:getAllTools,getSpecificTool:getSpecificTool,createNewTool:createNewTool,updateTool:updateTool,deleteTool:deleteTool};
